1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Haiyah said:"I saw 'Ali performing ablution and he washed his feet up to the ankles, then he said: 'I wanted to show you how your Prophet purified himself

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي غَسْلِ الْقَدَمَيْنِ
